title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 13.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 13.2 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) CPLR means the

Civil Practice Law and Rules. (b) Party means the staff of the Department of Economic Development and all persons
designated as petitioner, respondent, or intervenor in any adjudicatory
proceeding subject to this Part. (c) Report means the hearing officer's
summary of the hearing record, including their findings of fact, conclusions
and recommendations on the findings. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
13.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
